## Summary
What change would you like to see and why?

## Motivation
Why does this matter to integrators, buyers, or sellers?

## Proposed Solution
Provide a high-level description of the adjustment, including any schema or process updates.

## Alternatives Considered
List any alternative designs or mitigations.
